rows.label: qev013801_MSG0002
rows.name: Hmm? Oh, are you the one who picked up my listing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0034
rows.name:
The issue I need resolved is urgent, yet I've had no luck
finding help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'd like to begin briefing you immediately.
But first I must ask you one question...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0003
rows.name:
To my eye, New LA is a wild pastiche of alien races.
How do you view our city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_JNK0010
rows.name: Romanticize

rows.label: qev013801_SEL0011
rows.name: Wax poetic about New LA and its residents.

rows.label: qev013801_JNK0020
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev013801_SEL0021
rows.name: Talk up how all NLA citizens work together.

rows.label: qev013801_JNK0030
rows.name: Criticize

rows.label: qev013801_SEL0031
rows.name: Complain that New LA is wretched and unwholesome.

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0004
rows.name:
I can certainly understand your sense of pride for the
home we've built here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0005
rows.name: I've watched it grow as well—for better and for worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0006
rows.name:
Some xenos, for example, continue to flout the
city's laws. Should they not be held accountable
for their actions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0007
rows.name:
You've overshot optimistic and landed squarely in
delusion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0008
rows.name:
Such rose-tinted visions of the city only do it harm
in the end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0009
rows.name:
Some xenos, for example, continue to flout the
city's laws. Should they not be held accountable
for their actions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0010
rows.name: I agree with your powers of observation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0011
rows.name: I've watched this city grow—for better and for worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Some xenos, for example, continue to flout the
city's laws. Should they not be held accountable
for their actions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_JNK0110
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev013801_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Alex what he intends to do about the lawbreakers.

rows.label: qev013801_JNK0120
rows.name: Challenge

rows.label: qev013801_SEL0121
rows.name: Question if humans have the right to judge other races.

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0013
rows.name: My plan is simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0014
rows.name:
If you wish to live in this human city, you must agree to
follow its human laws. This is not too much to ask.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0015
rows.name:
For example, we drive on the right side of the street
and stop at red lights.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0016
rows.name:
We throw our garbage away in proper receptacles in
order to keep the streets clean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0017
rows.name:
Tell me, where are we now? ...That's right. New LA.
And all who live here have come of their own free will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0018
rows.name:
Guest or resident, all who stay under our roof must
uphold our laws.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0019
rows.name:
This is the very essence of what it means to be a
civilized being. If we relinquish that, we have no future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0020
rows.name:
Yet look around you! These aliens parade about the
city as if they built it with their own two hands,
or tentacles, or whatever they have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0021
rows.name:
I propose we gather up each race and require them to
attend a seminar that clearly defines our customs.
We can start with the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0022
rows.name:
Well then? Will you assist me in this effort to raise our
fair city up to a higher standard?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0023
rows.name:
I see in you a kindred spirit, good [ST:gender p1=sir p2=madam ]!
I cannot thank you enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0024
rows.name:
I will round up as many Ma-non as I can.
I would, however, ask you to collar three
of them and return to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_JNK0210
rows.name: Censure[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_SEL0211
rows.name: Tell Alex you're not going to "collar" anyone.

rows.label: qev013801_JNK0220
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev013801_SEL0221
rows.name: Happily agree to go collar some Ma-non.

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0025
rows.name:
An unartful turn of phrase. My apologies. If you invite
the three Ma-non to the seminar on your end, maybe it
will help me learn to, er...deal with them appropriately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0026
rows.name:
Good luck collaring those three Ma-non.
Your cooperation is much appreciated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0027
rows.name:
I intend to hold a seminar instructing the Ma-non
in our customs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0028
rows.name:
I would ask you to go gather three of their kind as
participants in this endeavor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0029
rows.name: Ah, you found them! Fine work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0030
rows.name:
I have a special location reserved for my seminar on
traditional Earth customs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0031
rows.name:
By the end of the talk, I expect they will all be perfectly
assimilated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0032
rows.name: Come to the top of Headwater Summit in Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013801_MSG0033
rows.name:
The lesson I have planned can only be taught there.
For there they will be made to accept the truth...
by any means necessary.[ST:wait ]
